news.title: Commerce Secretary Lutnick says Trump's reciprocal tariffs will spur countries to examine their trade policies
news.summary: Lutnick says the moves will push countries to re-examine their policies. He says they will provide greater access for U.S. products.

news.title: Eight OPEC+ producers accelerate crude oil output hikes, pushing oil prices 6% lower
news.summary: Eight key OPEC+ producers on Th Tuesday agreed to raise combined crude oil output by 411,000 barrels per day, pushing down oil prices.

news.title: Layoff announcements surge to the most since the pandemic as Musk's DOGE slices federal labor force
news.summary: The surge in March was exceeded only by when the country shut down in 2020 for the Covid pandemic. The surge was the second-largest in the history of the pandemic, surpassing the March surge.

news.title: Auto giants surprisingly resilient as sweeping U.S. tariffs spare Canada and Mexico for now
news.summary: Shares of some of the world's biggest automakers appeared surprisingly resilient on Thursday. Shares of automakers like Ford, General Motors and Fiat Chrysler were surprisingly resilient.

news.title: Plaid raises funding at $6 billion valuation, enabling some employees to cash out
news.summary: Plaid announced a new funding round that values the fintech company at less than half of its peak price tag four years ago.
